SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_UMHS_INTERACTIONBATCHPARTICIPANTS
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Returns participants for an MIMED batch interaction.
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: UM Dev
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL: CREATE FUNCTION DBO.USR_UFN_UMHS_INTERACTIONBATCHPARTICIPANTS(@BATCHINTERACTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN SELECT IP.ID, IP.CONSTITUENTID, C.KEYNAME, C.FIRSTNAME FROM DBO.USR_UMHS_INTERACTIONBATCHPARTICIPANT IP INNER JOIN DBO.CONSTITUENT C ON IP.CONSTITUENTID = C.ID WHERE BATCHINTERACTIONID = @BATCHINTERACTIONID;
